member.name: T:Cuemon.Data.Integrity.EntityDataIntegrityMethod
member.summary: Specifies ways for a checksum of data to be computed.

member.name: F:Cuemon.Data.Integrity.EntityDataIntegrityMethod.Unaltered
member.summary: Indicates default behavior which is leaving the checksum unaltered.

member.name: F:Cuemon.Data.Integrity.EntityDataIntegrityMethod.Combined
member.summary: Indicates that a checksum is combined from all given input and hence always will be available.

member.name: F:Cuemon.Data.Integrity.EntityDataIntegrityMethod.Timestamp
member.summary: Indicates that a checksum is generated from date-time inputs.

member.name: T:Cuemon.Data.Integrity.EntityDataIntegrityValidation
member.summary: Specifies the validation strength of a data checksum.

member.name: F:Cuemon.Data.Integrity.EntityDataIntegrityValidation.Unspecified
member.summary: Indicates that no checksum strength was specified.

member.name: F:Cuemon.Data.Integrity.EntityDataIntegrityValidation.Weak
member.summary: Indicates that a weak, semantic equivalent checksum was specified.

member.name: F:Cuemon.Data.Integrity.EntityDataIntegrityValidation.Strong
member.summary: Indicates that a strong, byte-for-byte checksum was specified.
